chapters.title: Chapter 54: The Sending
chapters.info: Tell Lewin, p. 693 (959)—Dannil's brother. He looks just like him except for a pickaxe nose and long thin mustaches in the Domani style. Note: in the hardcover edition, this character is Ban Lewin, Dannil's cousin. Tell is still with the band, however, and is mentioned later on page 693. See also Lewin, Dannil; Lewin, Tell.
